_header: From heaven in to earth God greeting he send
_description: Fragmentary poem on the Annunciation — eighteen lines in triplets, corrupt in middle

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
From heouene in to eorþe god gretynge he sendeBi on Archaungle
                    þat to Marye wende…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…Mones imone on me ne may nomon fyndeof dred wes þat
                    mayde (f.188v)…of þine swete wordes ich am swiþe
                    gledIch am godes wenche ful wel ich habbe i sped……þat
                    for his swete moder luue þat feyr is and hendeBringe vs to þe
                    blisse þat lesteþ buten ende
OxfJesus29.Note:
Eleven lines on f. 188v and seven lines on f.
                    181.
